items.name: Paragraph
items.label:
RECAPHE- Institutional  Academic Leaders Assessment tool

This self-assessment tool will enable Institutional leaders to measure their  levels of attaintment for a set of competences related to Research and Innovation in Professional Higher Educattion (PHE)  which had been grouped in the following competence clusters:

  1. Research Design for Innovation
  2. Research Management
  3. External Cooperation and Knowledge Transfer
  4. Teamwork
  5. Research Based Teaching
  6. Leadership, Scientific Guidance and Supervision

Instructions for using the tool:

  1.  Please provide your basic information and the date on which you are running this self-assessment.
  2. Each of the above mentioned competence clusters has associated a collection of questions you should answer rating your abilities to perform on the scale from 1 to 6, where 1 is "not able at all" and 6 is "able to initiate and perform individually".
  3.  As soon as you will finish answering all questions, a report page will be generated and you can download it for analysing the results that will help you to determine which are your strengths and weaknessess on each completence cluster.

 

Assessment  general data:

items.name: First and last name
items.label: Please provide your name and surname

items.name: Date input
items.label: Please select the date for this assessment

items.name: Cluster_Select input
items.label: Please select which competence cluster you will like to assess

items.name: Paragraph
items.label:
Assessment Tool for Institutional leaders

RESEARCH DESIGN FOR INNOVATION-1

items.name: RDINNOVATION-1_Radio grid input
items.label: Please, self-asses on the scale from 1 to 6, where 1 is “not able at all” and 6 is “able to initiate and perform individually”, if you are able to:

optionsHorizontal.id: 1. (K) Recognise and identify research methods, terminology and problem-solving techniques
optionsHorizontal.name: 1. Recognise and identify research methods, terminology and problem-solving techniques

optionsHorizontal.id: 2.( S) Devise imaginative and innovative solutions to research problems
optionsHorizontal.name: 2. Devise imaginative and innovative solutions to research problems

optionsHorizontal.id: 3. (S) Apply an understanding of the characteristics of quantitative and qualitative research methods in research design and practise
optionsHorizontal.name: 3. Apply an understanding of the characteristics of quantitative and qualitative research methods in research design and practise

optionsHorizontal.id: 4. (S) Plan the overall process of designing a research study from its inception to its reporting stage
optionsHorizontal.name: 4. Plan the overall process of designing a research study from its inception to its reporting stage

optionsHorizontal.id: 5. (S) Implement adequate reseach methods and techniques according to the nature of each research project
optionsHorizontal.name: 5. Implement adequate reseach methods and techniques according to the nature of each research project
